description: Ralph Wiggum plugin stop hook for self-referential loops

hooks.command: if [[ "$(uname)" == MINGW* || "$(uname)" == MSYS* || "$(uname)" == CYGWIN* ]]; then powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/stop-hook.ps1"; else "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/stop-hook.sh"; fi
